flavorText:
"As expected, this sphere's design reflects the colors of the four moons . . . plus another?"
—Pontifex, elder researcher

foreignData.flavorText: „Wie erwartet, spiegeln sich im Design der Sphäre die Farben der vier Sonnen wider ... und ist da noch eine?" —Pontifex, weiser Forscher

foreignData.flavorText: "Tal como esperaba, el diseño de la esfera refleja los colores de las cuatro lunas y... ¿una más?" —Póntifex, investigador anciano

name: Chromatic Sphere
originalText: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Chromatic Sphere: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Draw a card.

rulings.text: This is a mana ability, which means it can be activated as part of the process of casting a spell or activating another ability. If that happens you get the mana right away, but you don’t get to look at the drawn card until you have finished casting that spell or activating that ability.
